nieuws.body: It was a lovely sunny day when this painting was made. The painter was inspired by the odd friendship between Johnny and his feline fella.
That day was a lovely day for the feline and his other animal friends. The owner made a lot of food for everyone in the house.
The painter caught the feline falling asleep. His best friend, baby fella, was there to sing a lullaby.
God wanted to touch the feline, but mister feline said no. Because of that, mister feline is gaining more weight.

nieuws.titel: My twin brother and his girlfriend
nieuws.body: The feline's twin brother joined mister feline for dinner that day. Feline's twin brother took his girlfriend with him, but she didn't brought any clothes with her.
Mister feline had a great day. But the morning after he had a so called 'kater'.
The painter was painting with a paint brush that had a laser in it. Little did he know that it was turned on and distracting his models.

nieuws.titel: One cat to rule them all
nieuws.body: Mister feline was helping Victoria to conquer the world.
Mister feline's milk was taken away that day. He got it back, but it was turned into something hideous called pudding.
That was the last day they saw Griffin. He jumped on the back of mister feline, but mister feline ran away with him straight into the forest.
